TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit MessageSecurityVersion extends System.Object
.class public auto ansi abstract MessageSecurityVersion extends System.Object

summary.span: 一个抽象容器类，在由其几个静态属性实现时包含安全组件的版本信息。

span.span: An abstract container class that, when implemented by several of its static properties, contains version information for security components.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此类是自定义令牌序列化的扩展性点。This class is the extensibility point for customizing token serialization. 此类是单一实例类，提供有关安全规范（WS-Security、WS-Trust、WS-Secure Conversation 和 WS-Security Policy）版本的信息，绑定必须支持这些安全规范。This class is a singleton that provides information about the versions of the security specifications, (WS-Security, WS-Trust, WS-Secure Conversation and WS-Security Policy), that must be supported by a binding. 此类包含七个 `static` 属性，每个属性返回一个此类的实例。The class contains seven `static` properties, each of which returns an instance of this class. 这些属性中的每一个表示安全规范版本的一个不同组合。Each of these properties represents a different combination of security specification versions. 此类的实例用作 `Create…CertificateBindingElement` 类上 方法调用中的参数。The instances of this class are used as parameters in the `Create…CertificateBindingElement` method calls on the class. 如果传递 属性，将创建绑定元素的标准版本。If you pass the property, you create a standard version of the binding element. 若要创建非标准版本，请传递与您的版本相匹配的属性。To create a non-standard version, pass the property that matches your version. 此类也包含由以前的实例实现的 `abstract` 属性。The class also contains `abstract` properties that are implemented by the previous instances.

MemberSignature.Value: Public MustOverride ReadOnly Property BasicSecurityProfileVersion As BasicSecurityProfileVersion

summary.span: 获取基本安全配置文件的版本信息。

span.span: Gets the version information for the Basic Security Profile.
The object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法由七个静态属性返回的此类的实例实现。This method is implemented by the instances of this class returned by the seven static properties. 每个实现表示规范版本的一个不同组合，因此返回的此属性的值也不同。Each implementation represents a different combination of specification versions, and so returns a different value for this property.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Shared ReadOnly Property Default As MessageSecurityVersion

summary.span: 获取默认消息安全的版本信息。

span.span: Gets the version information for default message security.

value.span: 表示默认消息安全的 对象。

span.span: The object that represents the default message security.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 默认安全规范为 WS-Security 1.1、WS-Trust 2005 年 2 月版本、WS-SecureConversation 2005 年 2 月版本和 WS-SecurityPolicy 1.1。The default security specifications are WS-Security 1.1, WS-Trust of February 2005, WS-SecureConversation of February 2005 and WS-SecurityPolicy 1.1. 该静态属性返回一个此类的实例。This static property returns an instance of this class. 此类的实例用作 `Create…CertificateBindingElement` 类上 方法调用中的参数。The instance of this class is used as parameters in the `Create…CertificateBindingElement` method calls on the class.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property SecureConversationVersion As SecureConversationVersion

summary.span: 获取与消息安全版本相对应的 WS-SecureConversation 版本。

span.span: Gets the WS-SecureConversation version that corresponds to the message security version.

value.span: 与消息安全版本相对应的 。

span.span: The object that corresponds to the message security version.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法由七个静态属性返回的此类的实例实现。This method is implemented by the instances of this class returned by the seven static properties. 每个实现表示规范版本的一个不同组合，因此返回的此属性的值也不同。Each implementation represents a different combination of specification versions and so returns a different value for this property.

MemberSignature.Value: Public MustOverride ReadOnly Property SecurityPolicyVersion As SecurityPolicyVersion

summary.span: 获取与消息安全版本相对应的 WS-SecurityPolicy 版本。

span.span: Gets the WS-SecurityPolicy version that corresponds to the message security version.

value.span: 与消息安全版本相对应的 。

span.span: The object that corresponds to the message security version.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法由七个静态属性返回的此类的实例实现。This method is implemented by the instances of this class returned by the seven static properties. 每个实现表示规范版本的一个不同组合，因此返回的此属性的值也不同。Each implementation represents a different combination of specification versions and so returns a different value for this property.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property SecurityTokenVersion As SecurityTokenVersion

Attribute.AttributeName: [get: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")]
[<get: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")>]

summary.span: 获取与消息安全版本相对应的安全令牌版本。

span.span: Gets the security token version that corresponds to the message security version.

value.span: 与消息安全版本相对应的 。

span.span: The object that corresponds to the message security version.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法由七个静态属性返回的此类的实例实现。This method is implemented by the instances of this class returned by the seven static properties. 每个实现表示规范版本的一个不同组合，因此返回的此属性的值也不同。Each implementation represents a different combination of specification versions and so returns a different value for this property. 此属性用于查询在 中定义的令牌序列化程序工厂接口，以获取一个能够序列化令牌的令牌序列化程序实例。This property is used to query a token serializer factory interface defined in for a token serializer instance capable of serializing tokens.

span.span: Gets the WS-Security version that corresponds to the message security version.

value.span: 与消息安全版本相对应的 。

span.span: The object that corresponds to the message security version.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Shared ReadOnly Property WSSecurity10WSTrust13WSSecureConversation13WSSecurityPolicy12BasicSecurityProfile10 As MessageSecurityVersion

summary.span: 获取要求 Basic Security Profile 1.0 的消息安全版本，Basic Security Profile 1.0 以 WS-Security 1.0、WS-Trust 1.3、WS-SecureConversation 1.3 和 WS-SecurityPolicy 1.2 安全规范为基础。

span.span: Gets the message security version that requires the Basic Security Profile 1.0 based on WS-Security 1.0, WS-Trust 1.3, WS-SecureConversation 1.3 and WS-SecurityPolicy 1.2 security specifications.

value.span: 需要基于WS-Security 1.0、WS-Trust 1.3、WS-SecureConversation 1.3 和 WS-SecurityPolicy 1.2 安全指定的 Basic Security Profile 1.0 的 。

span.span: The object that requires the Basic Security Profile 1.0 based on WS-Security 1.0, WS-Trust 1.3, WS-SecureConversation 1.3 and WS-SecurityPolicy 1.2 security specifications.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 该静态属性返回一个此类的实例。This static property returns an instance of this class. 此类的实例用作 `Create…CertificateBindingElement` 类上 方法调用中的参数。The instance of this class is used as parameters in the `Create…CertificateBindingElement` method calls on the class.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Shared ReadOnly Property WSSecurity10WSTrustFebruary2005WSSecureConversationFebruary2005WSSecurityPolicy11BasicSecurityProfile10 As MessageSecurityVersion

summary.span: 获取要求 Basic Security Profile 1.0 的消息安全版本，Basic Security Profile 1.0 以 WS-Security 1.0、WS-Trust 2005 年 2 月版本、WS-SecureConversation 2005 年 2 月版本和 WS-SecurityPolicy 1.1 安全规范为基础。

span.span: Gets the message security version that requires the Basic Security Profile 1.0 based on WS-Security 1.0, WS-Trust of February 2005, WS-SecureConversation of February 2005 and WS-SecurityPolicy 1.1 security specifications.

value.span: 需要基于 WS-Security 1.0、WS-Trust of February 2005、WS-SecureConversation of February 2005 和 WS-SecurityPolicy 1.1 安全指定的 Basic Security Profile 1.0 的 对象。

span.span: The object that requires the Basic Security Profile 1.0 based on WS-Security 1.0, WS-Trust of February 2005, WS-SecureConversation of February 2005 and WS-SecurityPolicy 1.1 security specifications.
